MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL74 postcode area of Tyn Y Gongl, affecting properties in Lon Conway, Lon Penrhyn  and surrounding areas. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 9.30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 09:15AM on 2nd November 2020
